channel.title: FOSS on Uğurcan Akkök

item.title: Free and Open Source Software
item.description: What is Free Software ? First things first, Free doesn’t mean free as in beer, it means free as in freedom. It is designed to protect user’s rights to use it, study it and share it. Richard Stallman, the founder of Free Software Foundation (FSF), states it has four essential points. Users should be able to Run it as they wish Study the source code Modify the source code Share the source code with the changes.
